The most efficient way to produce compressed air.

Compressed air is one of the most important auxiliary powers in industry and crafts. Particularly for continual compressed air requirements BOGE screw compressors are the first choice.

Series S by BOGE sets standards for the efficient and reliable production of compressed air and ensures that you always have air to work.

 

Excellent performance with low operating costs, Energy saving and environmentally friendly

 

–   The BOGE energy-saving air end with an optimized screw profile ensures, in combination with generously designed components, optimally designed performance ranges and maximum volumetric efficiencies.

–   The intelligent design of the whole system allows the lowest internal pressure loss and optimal suction of the oil injection cooled BOGE-compression stage

–   The BOGE suction regulator ensures, through a fully balanced start, gentle and intrinsically safe operation of all moving parts. If the system is at a standstill

it closes off hermetically

–   The high-efficiency, maintenance-free BOGE GM drive system

achieves maximum lifetime through optimal, operation-dependent dynamic adjustment of the belt tension and optimises power consumption through the use of high-efficiency IE 3 drive motors

–   The targeted cool air feed through the sound attenuation cowl with dirt repellent lining in the BOGE cool air flow ensures, with highly effective aftercoolers, low compressed air output temperatures and optimal cooling of all integrated components. The conscious use of the chimney effect ensures perfect flow conditions and prevents heat nests when the machine is idle

–   The use of the latest compressor controlsensures, with the BOGE control, regulation and monitoring concept, the automatic selection of the most efficient operating mode as well as intrinsically safe operation at all times of the compressor. Individual fault alarms, permanent current compression temperature and pressure displays, precise and easy pressure settings on the keyboard and frost protection for compressors to -10°C from the factory are just some of the features

 

Maintenance friendly

–   For routine inspection and maintenance the entire inside must be easily accessible through large doors and removable sheeting in the cover

–   Easy maintenance due to spin-on oil separator cartridge and high capacity oil filter; valveless oil circuit

–   This minimises your maintenance and service costs

 

Additional features

–   Compressor unit isolated from mechanical vibration

–   Motor protection IP 55 with PTC thermistors

–   Integrated electrical switch cabinet (IP 54)

–   Belt guard for safe operation and protection of the V-belt from dirt ingress

–   Constant low oil carry-over in all operating phases due to efficient pre-separation in the integral compressed air-oil separator

–   No condensate in the oil due to thermostatically controlled oil cooler

–   Powder coated surface, light blue, RAL 5012
